resources.string: An enthusiastic Software Engineer, specialized in Mobile Development, with a passion for building scalable Mobile Apps.

I am skilled in native mobile app development, with 1+ year of experience in designing, developing and maintaining Android apps. I have been using Java in building scalable and delightful apps, and also do have a hang on Kotlin.\nMy passion for building apps drives me into a recursive loop of learning to become a better version of myself, and to meaningfully contribute to the actualization of team goals.
I am currently engaged as a Mobile developer at the HNG9 Internship with a strong dedication and commitment to work

The degree program offers a modern and technology-integrated curriculum, ensuring an interdisciplinary learning environment where students are exposed to a multitude of related disciplines broadening their skills needed for a competitive market. The course units evolve from fundamentals through more advanced topics, whereby the students will have an adequate preparation in engaging in real-world projects during their industrial training. Individual, group and mini-projects throughout the course will allow the students to explore various horizons in th IT arena
Collaborating with a team of developers to build scalable mobile products
